properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
FOUR VESSELS, NUMEROUS PERSONS ON BOARD,
IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE IN 33-03N 012-28E.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
